policy_spec.description: create policies banish all traffic from internet

suggestions: Consider adding a parameter to control whether hostNetwork is flagged as a violation. Currently, it's hardcoded to always be a violation.  This could be a boolean parameter in the schema and rego.

The policy currently flags all `hostPort` uses. Depending on the use case, it might be beneficial to also check the `hostIP` to determine if it is bound to a specific interface (e.g., localhost) rather than all interfaces (0.0.0.0) which would effectively be exposing to the internet.
